name: Cozy
description: Cozy is a platform that brings all your web services in the same private space. With it, your web apps and your devices can share data easily, providing you with a new experience.
short_desc: Cozy on your own hardware where no one profiles you.
author: Cozy

form_fields.label: Admin Passphrase
form_fields.hint: Admin passphrase for all administrative commands if undefined on first start, a random password will be chosen and shown in logs
